values:
You cannot quit me so quickly
There's no hope in you for me
No corner you could squeeze me
But I got all the time for you, love

The Space Between
The tears we cry
Is the laughter keeps us coming back for more
The Space Between
The wicked lies we tell
And hope to keep safe from the pain

But will I hold you again?
These fickle, fuddled words confuse me
Like 'Will it rain today?'
Waste the hours with talking, talking
These twisted games we're playing

We're strange allies
With warring hearts
What wild-eyed beast you be
The Space Between
The wicked lies we tell
And hope to keep safe from the pain

Will I hold you again?
Will I hold...

Look at us spinning out in
The madness of a roller coaster
You know you went off like a devil
In a church in the middle of a crowded room
All we can do, my love
Is hope we don't take this ship down

The Space Between
Where you're smiling high
Is where you'll find me if I get to go
The Space Between
The bullets in our firefight
Is where I'll be hiding, waiting for you
The rain that falls
Splash in your heart
Ran like sadness down the window into...
The Space Between
Our wicked lies
Is where we hope to keep safe from pain

Take my hand
'Cause we're walking out of here
Oh, right out of here
Love is all we need here

The Space Between
What's wrong and right
Is where you'll find me hiding, waiting for you
The Space Between
Your heart and mine
Is the space we'll fill with time
The Space Between
The tears we cry is the laughter keeps us coming back for more
The space between
Our wicked lies where we hope to keep safe from pain

The space between

If you do not have it, download Come what may from Moulin Rouge

*sings* Never knew I could feel like this...like I've never seen the sky before...want to vanish inside your kiss...........*sigh*

sometimes I wish I had just that...someone to love me as though it were the only thing that matters

STUPID MOVIES MAKING ME DELUSIONAL

So the summer is about to start. I can't friggen wait. I miss all my friends and I hope to see all the people I graduated with....maybe.
Time for sleep really but I have this story due tomorrow. I might post it up later.
~Deej

Meghan~ Girl we have got to go to Vegas right after you turn 21! You check us into the room and Well have a great weekend....ROXOR!!
We can spend the weekend chillin' and when we get bored we can go ride some coasters or go to a show or something.

New journal... a new start Life has been good lately. 
Yesterday was SPAM. It was a great day. The music rocked. Devenair  and Soul Majestic showed up but I was really happy when East LA Sabor Factory came. I was working backstage and with the bands so all in all me and the people I was working with were their bitches, although I wasn't about to  give Ernie a back massage!...LOL...but I had a great time and walked around with them after the show
It was a very good day, and night.
